t: Amazon announces its largest reduction in plastic packaging in North America to date
s: June 20, 2024 - Last October, Amazon announced our first U.S. automated fulfillment center in Ohio to eliminate plastic delivery packaging, including the transition from plastic air pillows to paper filler. This work in Ohio allowed us to test and learn and move quickly on transitioning to paper filler for ...

t: Too much plastic: Why Amazon’s packaging needs to change
